author: glasser
msg: The buildbot shows the end of the build output in its email/RSS
alerts.  If there are many SKIPs (ra_local, say), it'll drive the
actual failures off the top.  Simple fix: print SKIP first, then
(TestHarness.run): Swap the order of SKIP and failure output.

author: glasser
msg: Followup to r27556: fix expected output from "svnadmin dump" in the
svnsync tests to include the new copy-source checksum field.
Add Text-copy-source-md5 fields to every copied file node.

author: glasser
msg: Use different structs for revision and transaction roots in FSFS,
because they don't share *any* of the same fields.
And document why which root gets which data a little

author: kfogel
msg: (Building the Latest Source under Windows): Fix url to MASM.
